    • Uses of ModelUpdate in it.polimi.deib.se2019.sanp4.adrenaline.common.updates

      Subclasses of ModelUpdate in it.polimi.deib.se2019.sanp4.adrenaline.common.updates 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      class  ActionCardUpdate
      An update sent to a player when an ActionCard changes.
      class  DrawnPowerupUpdate
      An update sent when a player draws a PowerupCard.
      class  DrawnWeaponUpdate
      An update sent when a player draws a WeaponCard.
      class  InitialUpdate
      A general update sent when a player connects to the server
      class  LeaderboardUpdate
      An update containing the leaderboard and the final scores of players sent once the match is over
      class  LobbyUpdate
      This update is sent in broadcast by the Lobby to notify the players who are waiting for a match to start.
      class  MatchOperationalStateUpdate
      An update sent when the MatchOperationalState changes
      class  MatchUpdate
      An update sent when the Match changes its status.
      class  PlayerBoardUpdate
      An update sent when a player gets hit, marked or killed.
      class  PlayerTurnUpdate
      An update containing the turn that is currently being played, sent when a new turn begins
      class  PlayerUpdate
      An update sent when a Player changes its status.
      class  SquareUpdate
      An update sent when a Square changes its status
      class  WeaponCardUpdate
      An update sent when a WeaponCard changes its status

      Methods in it.polimi.deib.se2019.sanp4.adrenaline.model with parameters of type ModelUpdate 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void Model.notifyObservers(Collection<String> recipients, ModelUpdate event)
      Sends the event to the observers of the recipients (i.e. calls Observer.update(Object) on them).
      void Model.notifyObservers(ModelUpdate event)
      Sends the event to all the observers, regardless of the usernames they subscribed to.
      void Model.notifyObservers(String username, ModelUpdate event)
      Sends the event to the observers of the username (i.e. calls Observer.update(Object) on them).
      void ModelImpl.update(ModelUpdate update)
      Send an event from an Observable object.
